briefTitle: Investigation in Myositis-associated Pneumonitis of Prednisolone And Concomitant Tacrolimus
officialTitle: An Open-label Clinical Trial of the Combination Treatment of Tacrolimus and Corticosteroid in Polymyositis/Dermatomyositis Patients With Interstitial Pneumonitis, With Comparison Against Corticosteroid-treated Historical Controls
summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of the combination treatment of tacrolimus and corticosteroid in polymyositis/dermatomyositis patients with interstitial pneumonitis with comparison against corticosteroid-treated historical controls.
